data.title: Condolences for David W. Fisher
data.meta_description: Condolences for David W. Fisher . Leave a condolence/sign guess book.
data.text:
Hi,

My name is Harvey Miller. I don't think that any of Dave's family will know who I am. I was Dave's roommate for our Freshman year at the U of R.

We had an exciting year together. Our first time away from home. (even though we both grew up locally) We had a lot in common. On Wednesday nights we would take a break from studying to watch our favorite TV programs in the lounge of our dorm.

I played basketball that year and Dave became the manager on that team. We joined different Fraternities and I lived in the Fraternity house the next year, so we didn't spend as much time together.

After graduation we went our separate ways, as most college friends do. I did see him on occasion at university functions and often thought of him.

Dave was a fine person. A good friend and gentleman. I can see from the pictures that he was a great family man.

My thoughts and Prayers are with all of you in this difficult time. My Wife passed three years ago, so I know the emotions you are dealing with. Rely on your Faith, Family and Friends.

My Condolences.

Harvey
